TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DriveEjectButtonHandler(object o, DriveEjectButtonArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed DriveEjectButtonHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the DriveEjectButtonHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the DriveEjectButtonHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the DriveEjectButtonHandler is removed from the event.
